ygData.subject: Re: New Topic, Languages!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes I have learned lizardman and High Erudite Valiance 16th order Paladin in the service of the clerics of Underfoot
ygData.messageBody:
Yes I have learned lizardman and High Erudite

Valiance
16th order Paladin in the service of the clerics of Underfoot

Chris Ferriera wrote:

> From: Chris Ferriera <cferriera@...>
>
> HI all, I wanted to start a new discussion, and it is on Languages.
>
> The ones I know are Common, Elf, Barbarian, Dwarf, Halfling and
> GNOLL! Yes I learned Gnoll!. I was wondering if anyone else has learned a
> not all-to-common language? And if so, what where how and why? I got Gnoll
> from a halfling who macro'd me for a good 15 mins.
>
> -Dyce
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Have you visited the new ONElist home page lately?
> http://www.ONElist.com
> ONElist: The Leading e-mail list and community service on the Internet!
